main event: On 24 September 1959, at 1200Z, a policeman and an FAA station operator sighted a bright light in Redmond, Oregon, which appeared to change colors and exhibited erratic movements.
interesting points: The object had four protruding lights (red, green, yellow, and white),The object hovered at an altitude of 300 feet before ascending to 3000 feet,The total observation time was approximately one hour and 49 minutes,Both witnesses described the object as extremely bright and observed it moving rapidly toward and away,The sighting led to multiple aircraft being scrambled from Portland for a potential intercept, but no radar contact was confirmed.
sighted object: Bright light with four protruding lights
witness description: Laverne Wertz, FAA station operator, and Officer Robert Dickerson, Redmond Police Department
